code: import React,{useContext}from'react';import{BillContext}from'../../Context/BillContext';import'./style.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var BillTotal=function BillTotal(){var _useContext=useContext(BillContext),bills=_useContext.bills,selectedCostInterval=_useContext.selectedCostInterval;var moneyIntervalTransform=function moneyIntervalTransform(cost){var monthlyCost=Number.parseFloat(cost);switch(selectedCostInterval){case'Monthly':return monthlyCost;case'Yearly':return monthlyCost*12;case'Weekly':return monthlyCost*12/52;case'Daily':return monthlyCost*12/365;default:return 0;}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"total-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bill-total-container",children:[selectedCostInterval," bill cost :",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"total-cost",children:'₹ '+bills.reduce(function(acc,val){return val.enabled?moneyIntervalTransform(val.monthlyCost)+acc:acc;},0).toFixed(2)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"total-save-container",children:[selectedCostInterval," saved :",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"total-saved",children:'₹ '+bills.reduce(function(acc,val){return!val.enabled?moneyIntervalTransform(val.monthlyCost)+acc:acc;},0).toFixed(2)})]})]});};export default BillTotal;
